title: Is League Of Legends Too Forgiving?

embed.description: In this video i cover the more forgiving elements of league of legends, the progression of these elements and most importantly, the question a lot are asking ... have they went too far? Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/scrap_computer Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/ScrapComputer/768478713181956?fref=ts Twitter: https://twitter.com/Scrap_Computer

body: Not my video, clearly. Just saw the video and realized there were a lot of valid points. Will Riot ever consider removing some of these mechanics?
